description: List of all applications received for temporary events during the 2015 Spring Festival Season (March 9 - 22, 2015).  This list only includes applications and details known at time of submission. It does not reflect if any adjustments or if application has been approved, denied, or withdrawn.

metadata.attribution: City of Austin, Austin Center for Events
